attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Over the past few years, consumers have been buying "HD Ready" TVs in preparation for the digital TV switchover. Many consumers are under the impression that these TVs are "ready" to receive high definition television via freeview.

I believe suppliers, manufacturers and the freeview organisation have been far from honest in the marketing of these TVs and the digital switchover. 

I call upon the prime minister to intervene to stop this rogue trading.
